game_session_override_prompt: Do you wish to overwrite the saved session?
game_session_load_prompt: Current session will be lost. Do you wish to load the game?
game_restart_prompt: Do you wish to restart the game?
local_storage_not_supported: Local storage is not supported by your browser. Please disable "Private Mode", or upgrade to a modern browser.
game_session_saved: Session has been saved to your browser.
cannot_load_gamebook_prompt: Sorry, but we cannot load the specified gamebook: {0}. Maybe you need to check the network connection, as well as whether you've got the correct URL.
